name: Search SKU to Product page
author: Xaraar, firdousi

sections.installation: Just install and activate the plugin and search with SKU in the search bar. User will be redirect to product page.
sections.changelog:
1.3

  • Woocommerce basic configurations

1.1

  • Update search by filtering spaces from SKU

1.0

  • Initial release
sections.description:
Woo Sku to Product, If a user search for a production by its SKU user will be redirected to Product page directly
Woo Commerce basic configurations. Change WooCommerce Add To Cart Button Text, Change WooCommerce Proceed to checkout button text
